title: Slow cooker lamb hotpot
ingredients: ['750g boneless leg of lamb, diced', '50g plain flour', '2 onions, sliced', '2 sticks celery , sliced', '1 carrot, cubed', '100g swede, cubed', '30ml dry sherry', '1/2 teaspoon prepared English mustard', '1 large pinch ground nutmeg', '3 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', '400ml beef stock', '3 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '450g potatoes, peeled and sliced', '2 tablespoons butter']
